transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello Patel sir good afternoon.
Customer: Bolo.
Executive: Sir mai Richa baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART head office se.
Customer: Ha sir.
Executive: Boliye boliye madam.
Customer: Sir aapne ek concept place karaya tha IndiaMART pe aapke amount ke refund ke liye bare me.
Customer: Boliye boliye madam.
Executive: Aapka na sir 13940 rupaye ka amount hai jo refund banta hai aapka.
Customer: 13940 rupaye.
Executive: Accha ji sir.
Customer: Itna itna kyu kata 33000 me se.
Executive: Kitne me se sir.
Customer: Kitne mahine ka kata mera.
Executive: Ek minute sir mai bata deti hu.
Executive: Aapki facility April se lekar October tak na.
Customer: October mahine to use hi nahi kiya madam navma mahine 31 tarikh ko to maine band karva diya tha 269 ko band karva diya tha.
Executive: Accha October ko band hua hai aapka man lijiye 10 269 ko bola usne 6 October ko tum maine to bola tha usko 159 tak bola tha 159 bola tha navma mahina pura aapko use karna padega usne bola aapko last ending me band ho jayega aisa hi bola tha.
Executive: Sir wahi cheez hai matlab 6 October tak ka aapka paisa ek mahina jyada kat liya.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to know why amount was deducted.



Resolution:

- Executive is checking the details.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, subscription, deduction
